segments.text: Welcome to Lens Magic , ma ’ am.How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d like to buy an inexpensive camera .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , we ’ Ve got several point-and-shoot cameras.These are all 35mm compact cameras with auto-focus and a built-in flash.We also have these Polaroid cameras .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t think I ’ ll need a Polaroid.Does this 35mm camera have an automatic flash ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it does.But you can turn it off if you want .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , I ’ ll take this one.Does it come with batteries and a case ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it does.Here , I ’ ll box it up for you .
segments.speaker: S1
